title: Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Enhancement Program in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Blended delivery combining social studies curriculum with VR simulations and online platforms, where students access learning data via personal devices and experience self-regulated learning strategies

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize self-regulated learning strategies (task strategies, self-assessment) with over 80% accuracy when performing VR simulation tasks
Learners maintain focused learning time of over 10 hours per week on an online learning platform and achieve psychological engagement of over 75%
Learners can improve task performance accuracy by over 40% by applying self-regulated learning-based error correction strategies in formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
